thread.title: Newly-slim Jennifer Ellison shows off incredible body transformation after losing over a stone
thread.title_full: Newly-slim Jennifer Ellison shows off incredible body transformation after losing over a stone

author: Josh Parry
title: Newly-slim Jennifer Ellison shows off incredible body transformation after losing over a stone
text:
She looks amazing (Photo: BBC) Share Get celebs     
Jennifer Ellison showed off her new slimmed-down frame, after promising to ditch fad diets. 
The former Brookie babe took to Instagram to show her new slender figure to her 47,000 followers. 
Earlier this year Jennifer, star of Dance Mums UK, spoke out of how a two-week crash diet left her feeling like her eyes would “pop out of her head.” 
Speaking about her ordeal earlier this year the actress admitted she was left need medical attention after going on a sugar-free crash diet for a reality TV show. Jen has transformed her body (Photo: ITV) She appeared on Sugar Free Farm last year 
She said: “I got hit the hardest with withdrawal, as my sugar intake was the highest. I was picking carrots with Jane on the farm and every time I bent down I felt like someone was standing on my eyeballs. I felt physically sick. 
“I had the worst headache I’ve ever, ever felt. If you’ve ever detoxed, take that feeling and times it by 10. We were detoxing from processed food, sugar, alcohol, everything. 
“It was literally like someone had put my head in a vice and was just twisting it and twisting it. It felt like my eyes might pop out of my head.” She used to be very slim (Photo: PA) 
Before the programme she was drinking six to eight cans of Coca-Cola every day, with snacks of Mars bars and jelly sweets, as she balanced the demands of motherhood with running her dance school business. 
The mum-of-three appeared on ITV’s Lorraine in 2015 and said she would “never yo-yo diet again.” 
Whatever the actress is trying now is obviously working - as she announced she’d lost over 1 stone since November. She's lost over a stone (Photo: ITV) 
Despite remaining tight-lipped on her weightloss secret, Jen told her followers: “Know Ive still got a long way to go but starting to see results and it feels so good. 
“Another seven inches of body fat lost on measurement day today!! Total weight lost since the end of November is 1stone 2 lbs. Just another 1stone 2lbs to go!” 
Her fans took to the social media sight to congratulate her on her amazing transformation. 
One commented: “You are looking amazing,” another added: “Well done you always look fab.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
